title: Le Pain Quotidien - Larchmont Village
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Western, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International restaurant chain featuring artisan bakery and communal table. Menu includes several ovo-lacto vegetarian dishes as well as vegan ones (denoted by carrot sign). Usually offers a vegan scone or vegan muffin. Spacious and relaxed interior.
